CATEGORY: Decision functions, Display and formatting functions
DESCRIPTION: Evaluates a number or Boolean value.
EXAMPLE: <h3>YesNoFormat Example</h3> <p>The YesNoFormat function returns non-zero values as "Yes"; zero, false and no Boolean values, and empty strings ("") as "No". <cfoutput> <ul> <li>YesNoFormat(1): #YesNoFormat(1)# <li>YesNoFormat(0): #YesNoFormat(0)# <li>YesNoFormat("1123"): #YesNoFormat("1123")# <li>YesNoFormat("No"): #YesNoFormat("No")# <li>YesNoFormat(True): #YesNoFormat(True)# </ul> </cfoutput>
